description:
As the day of the Paper Shuffle draws near, the plans of the various forces in play collide.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ayamachi o Okashi Nagara, Sore o Aratamenai Koto o Koso, Shin no Ayamachi to Iu.
If You Make a Mistake and Do Not Correct It, This Is Called a Mistake.
Ne pas se corriger après une faute, c’est là qu’est la faute.
過ちを犯しながら, それを改めないことをこそ, 真の過ちという.
